title: Hollywood’s Favorite Personal Shopper Gets Her Own L.A. Boutique
summary: Catherine Bloom, the town’s best-kept style secret, has left her longtime home at Neiman Marcus to launch her new venture with Nordstrom.

title: Top 10 trending destinations for U.S. travelers in 2026: 'Americans are discovering their own backyard,' expert says
summary: In October, Skyscanner released its best places to visit in 2026 report and ranked the top trending destinations for U.S. travelers.
